title: Workshop for Strengthening Online Teachers’ Peer Feedback Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online class facilitation experience and comprehension of collaborative learning principles
context.additional_context: A course focusing on acquiring peer feedback skills for designing online mathematics classes, including real-time feedback practice using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more specific feedback elements in a peer teacher’s online lesson design.
Learners can conduct two or more reflective dialogues with instructors by utilizing open-ended questions during peer feedback.
Learners can improve their own lesson design in two or more ways based on feedback content.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
